mapper.sql: out_trade_no, trade_no, car_number, total_fee, pay_status, notify_status, pay_flag, watch_id, car_type, s_id, openid, open_id_for_owner, enter_time, time_stamp, discount_type, discount_fee, discount_detail, card_id, apply_status, due_time, bill_id, t_order.park_id , park_name
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_order left join t_park on t_order.park_id = t_park.park_id
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_order (out_trade_no, trade_no, park_id, car_number, total_fee, pay_status, notify_status, pay_flag, watch_id, car_type, s_id, openid, open_id_for_owner, enter_time, time_stamp, discount_type, discount_fee, discount_detail, card_id, apply_status, due_time, bill_id) values (#{outTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalFee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{notifyStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{payFlag,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{watchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openIdForOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{discountType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discountFee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discountDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dueTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
